survey_name: Corporate Green Commuting Program Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the company's green commuting initiatives, including bike-to-work programs, electric vehicle charging stations, and public transit subsidies.

questions.question_text: Which of the following green commuting options have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow for multiple selections. Ensure options are mobile-friendly with clear checkboxes.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE. Include 'None of the above' as an option to capture non-users.

script.question_text: Which of the following green commuting options have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability and functionality of electric vehicle charging stations at your workplace?
answer_options: Not applicable (I do not use EV charging)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if 'Electric vehicle charging stations' is selected in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale with a 'Not applicable' option. Randomize scale order to reduce bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE. Ensure the 'Not applicable' option is clearly differentiated.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability and functionality of electric vehicle charging stations at your workplace?
answer_options: Not applicable (I do not use EV charging)
script.routing_logic: Appears if 'Electric vehicle charging stations' is selected in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to use green commuting options more frequently?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 250 characters for manageability.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT. Include character counter to inform respondents.

script.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to use green commuting options more frequently?

questions.question_text: How often do you use the company's bike-to-work program?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if 'Bike-to-work program' is selected in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale with clear intervals. Randomize options to reduce order bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE. Ensure mobile-friendly dropdown for smaller screens.

script.question_text: How often do you use the company's bike-to-work program?
script.routing_logic: Appears if 'Bike-to-work program' is selected in Q1

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the company's green commuting program to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point recommendation scale. Include a neutral midpoint.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE. Display as a horizontal radio button scale for desktop users.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the company's green commuting program to a colleague?
